text: Machine learning engineer, full-stack software developer, and student researcher.

I am a 4th-year student studying Computer Science at the University of Michigan College of Engineering who is interested in exploring bleeding-edge web technologies and machine learning algorithms. I have experience in web systems, databases, machine learning, and native app development.

I am currently conducting research under the Radiological Health Engineering Lab, where I am building cloud-native data pipelines and implementing machine learning models to learn from live radiation data.
I am also working on optical character recognition correction with state-of-the art models such as T5 and BERT to improve text data for Proquest.
